Grid

grid-margin

$grid-gutter: 40px;

grid-margin-outer

$grid-gutter-outer: 5px;

grid-breakpoints


                $grid-breakpoints:(
                        phone: 100% max 480px,
                        tablet: 100% min 481px max 1023px,
                        desktop: 1000px min 1024px max 1200px,
                        desktop-large: 1200px min 1200px
                );

grid-row

@include grid-row($empty: false, $fluid: false);

grid-col

@include grid-col ($col, $cols: 12, $collapse: false);

grid-col-breakpoint

@include grid-col-breakpoint ($device, $col, $cols: 12, $collapse: false);

grid-breakpoint


                @include grid-breakpoint ($devices...){
                	...
                };

grid-breakpoint-hide

@include grid-breakpoint-hide ($devices...);

grid-breakpoint-show

@include grid-breakpoint-show ($devices...);

Theme

theme-colors


                /* 1 = background */
                /* 2 = foreground */
                /* 3 = background-hover */
                /* 4 = foreground-hover */
                                   1                2               3              4
                $theme-colors:
                ocean      #00a7ca   #a4d6e5   #52cbf2   #d5f0fb
                blue #0075d3 #a4c2e9 #2c8bee #d0e0f9,
                purple #8244a7 #c7b1d6 #9e5dc1 #e4d7ed,
                pink #dd318a #f0adca #ff52a1 #ffd5e6,
                green #71be48 #c1e0b3 #87d873 #e1f4d8,
                yellow #f59d37 #fad2aa #ffb950 #ffebd3,
                orange #f75925 #fbb8a7 #ff7439 #ffdbd0,
                red #dd202b #f0a9ab #fe4542 #ffd3d2,
                dark #1c2731 #a8abac #313d48 #d0d2d4,
                grey #606c78 #bbbfc2 #798591 #dddfe2,
                silver #939fac #ced3d8 #b4c0cc #eaedf0;
                 

theme-color

theme-color ($color-name, $color-status:false);

theme

@include theme ($color, $type);

theme-all

@include theme-all ($type);
